projects.description: This program is design to show a random quote each time the button is pressed, or it will show a quote every 30 seconds if button is not pressed.
This application shows a list of 10 people on each page and can add more pages if more people are added.
This is a interactive from that uses real time error validation and will only submit until everything is filled out correctly.

This is a game that lets the user click any letter on the screen, then the program will determine if the letter is used in the phrase. If it is it will display the letter if not you lose a life if you lose all ofyour lifes you lose the game and you have the option to try again, if you win you will also have the option the try again which will reset the game.
This program uses a public API to request random people with thier information to create an employee directory.
